title: Exun Projects
description: I developed many projects as part of my 4 year tenure as member—and President—of my high school’s computer club. These included our link shortener, 4 redesigns of our website, a live updates mobile app used by thousands of participants at Exun 2018, and dozens of smaller web infrastructure projects and platforms.

title: Unslant
description: Unslant is a Chrome extension I built that offers other perspectives on the news you’re reading. It's currently offline due to server costs.
